name: ControllingEquity
label: controlling equity
definition: shareholders's equity that formally confers control in the entity, either by law or as explicitly stated in a corresponding equity instrument

name: Investor
label: investor
definition: party that owns some stake in some organization by way of investment

name: EntityOwner
definition: owner (person, group of people, or other business entity) that owns, or holds an ownership interest in, a formal business organization
label: entity owner

name: ConstitutionalOwner
label: constitutional owner
explanatoryNote: Typically this would be share ownership or the holding of partnership equity. Ownership in this 'constitutional' sense means that the owner is in some way a member of the organization, such as an employee or director, as distinct from some outside investor.
definition: entity owner that holds an equity stake in said entity, in the form of shareholders' equity

name: InvestorContract
label: investor contract
definition: Contract setting out the terms under which some investor invests in the entity and setting out the rights which are conferred on that investor.

name: UltimateConsolidation
definition: highest-level (top, end) ancestral ownership, evidenced by accounting consolidation, by some party of some other legal entity
label: ultimate ownership

name: EntityOwnership
label: entity ownership
definition: ownership by some party of an interest in some non-governmental formal organization

name: InvestmentEquity
label: investment equity
definition: equity that represents an ownership interest in some entity, but may or may not take the form of shareholders's equity

name: DirectConsolidation
label: direct consolidation
definition: direct ownership of an entity recorded as accounting consolidation

name: ForeignBranchOwnership
label: foreign branch ownership
definition: ownership by some party of some formal organization or organizational sub-unit that is a foreign affiliate and legally part of the owning entity

name: hasDirectOwnership
label: has direct ownership
definition: relates a formal organization to the situation in which it is owned directly by another entity

name: hasInvestmentEntity
definition: relates a legal person to a directly owned formal organization or subsidiary, depending on the percent ownership interest
label: has investment entity

name: hasOwnedEntity
label: has owned entity
definition: indicates a formal organization, including potentially a sole proprietorship, that is owned by a legal person

name: hasOwningEntity
definition: indicates a party that owns a formal organization
label: has owning entity

name: hasDirectOwningEntity
label: has direct owning entity
definition: relates a formal organization to a direct legal person / owner

name: hasInvestmentOwnership
label: has investment ownership
definition: relates a legal person to the context in which it owns a formal organization

name: guarantees
definition: provides a formal assurance or promise, esp. that certain conditions shall be fulfilled relating to a product, service, or transaction
label: guarantees
